title: Config
description: Config schema for managing Agribank micro front apps.

apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for calling your APIs (e.g., 'https://my.api.org/v1').

baseThemeUrl.description: Theme reference. Can be either '@local/base-theme/', '@agribank/base-theme/', or any valid URL.

anyOf.description: reads from your own public/ folder
any valid URI to provide your own custom theme.

basePaletteUrl.description: Palette URL. defaults to baseThemeUrl if not provided.
